channel.title: Flatpak on Dan Aukes
channel.description: Recent content in Flatpak on Dan Aukes

item.title: Preparation
item.description: Things you will need ssh public key configuration backup file gpg key First, update apt sudo apt update #save this for the end # sudo apt upgrade -y If a Virtual machine make sure you are a member of the vboxusers and vboxsf groups ^[https://www.

item.title: Multiple Clocks in Ubuntu / Gnome
item.description: sudo apt install -y gnome-clocks flatpak install -y com.mattjakeman.ExtensionManager flatpak run com.

item.title: quick scripts for openscad
item.description: color("red",1) import("path/to/your-part.stl"); flatpak run org.openscad.OpenSCAD -o test.png --projection orthogonal test.scad with camera orientation but no scaling
